name: theros_beyond_death_megapack
description: A very large Theros Beyond Death–inspired package: escape, constellation, devotion, sagas, Omens, Gods, Demigods, and enchantment synergies.

Enchantment: Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control, then you gain 1 life.
Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, tap up to one target creature an opponent controls. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

Flash
When this enters the battlefield, scry 2
{ACTIVATED_COST}: Sacrifice this permanent: You gain 2 life.

Flash
When this enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Human creature token
{ACTIVATED_COST}: Sacrifice this permanent: Tap up to one target creature.

Enchantment — Saga
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I — Create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
II — Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
III — Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
Creature: Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control, then you gain 1 life.
Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, tap up to one target creature an opponent controls. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

Escape {ESCAPE_COST_3} (You may cast this from your graveyard by paying its escape cost and also exiling 3 other cards from your graveyard.)

Indestructible.
